name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha Rahman is a 21-year-old Psychology major with a CGPA of 3.18. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve her academic goals, often putting in steady effort even when faced with challenges. While she sometimes experiences test anxiety, her perseverance helps her push through difficult periods. Aisha is confident in her ability to learn, but she knows she can improve her self-discipline to reach higher academic success. She is engaged in extracurricular activities related to her major and is considering pursuing graduate studies.
